definition: "eight" component in Chinese characters/archaic variant of 八[ba1]
one of the characters used in kwukyel, an ancient Korean writing system
protective umbrella/fig. person affording protection (esp. corrupt)
Umbelliferae or Apiaceae, plant family containing carrot, coriander etc
see 和尚打傘，無法無天|和尚打伞，无法无天[he2 shang5 da3 san3 , wu2 fa3 wu2 tian1]

sentences.english: The little rain drop slipt from the umbrella to my glasses.
sentences.chinese: 从她伞骨滑下来的小雨点溅在我眼镜玻璃上。

sentences.english: The lady beaned me with her umbrella.
sentences.chinese: 那位女士拿伞敲我的脑袋。

sentences.english: If it is an umbrella, memory is the most clear coagulation red umbrella.
sentences.chinese: 倘若是打伞，记忆最深的是清凝的红伞。

sentences.english: One of his hands, as I have said, held the umbrella: in the other arm he carried several brown-paper parcels.
sentences.chinese: 他一只手撑着伞，另一只手臂抱着几个棕色的纸包。

sentences.english: The fringelike fimbriae transport ovulated eggs from the ovarian surface to the infundibulum.
sentences.chinese: 花边状的伞将排出的卵，从卵巢表面运送到漏斗。

sentences.english: One day I was going to my auntie's home, mom told me to bring an umbrella in case it mined.
sentences.chinese: 一天我去姑姑家，妈妈叮嘱我带把伞以防下雨。

sentences.english: When the first paraglider appeared, People's dream came true.
sentences.chinese: 自从飞行伞出现后，人们的这一愿望得以实现。

sentences.english: Now days there are tens of thousands paragliding fans all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 如今，在世界各地，飞行伞爱好者已达数十万。

sentences.english: You can actually go parasailing at Walt Disney World. It's easy to do.
sentences.chinese: 事实上你还可以在迪士尼做帆伞运动，这很容易的。

sentences.english: I was the only umbrella, still wet of the people?
sentences.chinese: 我是独一有伞，依然淋湿的人吗？

sentences.english: In this paper, the modeling of optimal control in parafoil homing trajectory is discussed in detail.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了翼伞系统归航轨迹最优控制的建模。

sentences.english: Inflorescence a corymbose cyme , leaf-opposed or pseudo terminal, often at tips of tendrils.
sentences.chinese: 花序伞房状聚伞花序，对生或，通常在顶部的卷须。

sentences.english: Little rain drops falling from the rib of her umbrella splashed on my glasses.
sentences.chinese: 从她伞骨滑下来的小雨点溅在我眼镜玻璃上。

sentences.english: Rolling down rain drops from her umbrella ribs splashed on my glasses.
sentences.chinese: 从她伞骨滑下来的小雨点溅在我眼镜玻璃上。

sentences.english: Tenderly I put away the umbrella, slowly the rain drenches my heart.
sentences.chinese: 温和地我收拾伞，慢慢地雨湿透我的心。

definition: to take shelter from the rain
